column20: Charged Attack: Performs up to 5 rapid strikes.
column21: Plunging Attack: Consumes a certain amount of Stamina to unleash 2 rapid sword strikes.
column167: Abundance Amulets: Unleashes three swift thunder shadows that deal Electro DMG to opponents and leave an Abundance Amulet behind after hitting an opponent. 2 Abundance Amulets can be created initially. Using this skill will reset any Abundance Amulets that were generated.
column361: Thunderflash: When another nearby character in the party obtains an Abundance Amulet created by Lightning Blade, Lightning Blade's CD is decreased by 1.5s.
column362: Resounding Roar: Increases the Energy Recharge effect granted by Lightning Blade's Abundance Amulet by 10% of the Traveler's Energy Recharge.
column363: Spring Thunder of Fertility: The number of Abundance Amulets that can be generated using Lightning Blade is increased to 3.
column364: Violet Vehemence: When Falling Thunder created by Bellowing Thunder hits an opponent, it will decrease their Electro RES by 15% for 8s.
column365: Distant Crackling: Increases the Level of Bellowing Thunder by 3. Maximum upgrade level is 15.
column366: Fickle Cloudstrike: When a character obtains Abundance Amulets generated by Lightning Blade, if this character's Energy is less than 35%, the Energy restored by the Abundance Amulets is increased by 100%.
column367: Clamor in the Wilds: Increases the Level of Lightning Blade by 3. Maximum upgrade level is 15.
column368: World-Shaker: Every 2 Falling Thunder attacks triggered by Bellowing Thunder will increase the DMG dealt by the next Falling Thunder by 100%, and will restore an additional 1 Energy to the current character.
